prefix_prompt: I want to write music captions that describe the temporal order of two instruments. Write this caption in three styles
sufix_prompt: The answers need to be three sentences parsed with newlines. Do not number them. Do not add subjective information. Do not add any additional information than the temporal order.
captions:
Style 1:
Brass rings out first, followed by the strum of the guitar.
Guitar follows the sound of the brass.
The brass precedes the guitar.

Style 2:
Brass takes the lead, guitar follows.
The brass is the first to be heard, guitar comes after.
The order is brass then guitar.

Style 3:
Brass is the initial sound, guitar follows.
The brass is the first to be
